com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent
Class DelayedCallbackExecutor

java.lang.Object
  com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.DelayedCallbackExecutor

public final class DelayedCallbackExecutor
extends Object

This class is used to enqueue callback execution with specified delay. The general purpose of this class is to support networks, that does not provide delay between request for ad and callback invocation. This gap is vital and should be implemented artificially with this class.

Author:
Alexey Redinskii
